模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble

类 Main

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Main
public class Main extends javafx.application.Application
Main creates a JavaFX application stage and adds a scene into that stage. The size,themeColor of each scene is determined here.
另请参阅:
GameController, Info1Controller, Info2Controller, Info3Controller, InfoController, SettingsController, StartController

  • 方法详细资料

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws IOException
      The start method for Application to create stage and scene
      指定者:
      start 在类中 javafx.application.Application
      参数:
      primaryStage - indicates the window of JavaFX application
      抛出:
      IOException - when the route of fxml or css file does not exist
      IOException - if scene or theme is null

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      The method to run JavaFX application
      参数:
      args - indicates parameters from the console

    • getStage

      public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
      返回:
      the stage of the application
      另请参阅:
      StartController.onExitButtonClick()

    • setScene

      public static void setScene​(String scene) throws IOException
      参数:
      scene - indicates the name of the fxml file
      抛出:
      IOException - when the route for fxml file does not exist
      IOException - if fxmlLoader is null

    • setThemeColor

      public static void setThemeColor​(String themeColor) throws MalformedURLException
      参数:
      themeColor - indicates the name of css file
      抛出:
      MalformedURLException - indicates the potential exception in communication protocol
